explanation: [0-0] A bald man, wearing a red shirt, black innerwear, and black pants, is holding a bowl and a cloth. He's pulling the arm of a little girl who's carrying a dog. The girl is wearing a yellow hat and a blue, black, and white striped shirt. The background shows a red brick wall structure, with cardboard boxes, clothes, and other debris scattered on the ground, along with red pipes. Black text at the top of the video reads STEPDAD DRESSED ME AS HOBO EVERY DAY.

[0-3] Then, the man in red bends down, throws the bowl and cloth in his hands, and the little girl sits down due to the man's pulling. The man slaps the girl with his hand. Black text at the top of the video reads When l got a bad grade, my stepdad flipped out!
